about.title: About
about.aboutmetitle: Here's who I am & what I do
about.p1: I am a 19 year's old programming passionate student that aims to be one of the best programmers in the future. Born in Málaga, at 14 started programming small little programs. My hobbies are playing videogames, paddle and also watching eSports. I am currently studying Cross-Platform App Development in CPIFP Malaga Tech Park
about.p2: The project idea comes from ease the management of one of my favorite sectors, eSport world.

alerts.favteam: Do you want to move this team from favourites?
alerts.fireplayer: Do you want to fire this player?
alerts.cannotdelete: Cannot delete this player because its signed in a team.
alerts.cannotdeleteteam: Cannot delete this team because it has signed players.
